page.title: 11MARYC.EDUCATION THEN/NOW
page.content: Maryculter East Primary 2-teacher school caters for 37 children from 5-11 yrs.The Headteacher and Assistant teach general subjects.Art,Drama,Home Economics,Music,P.E,are taught by visiting specialists.Because of the proximity to Aberdeen where several parents work offshore in the North Sea oil industry we have children of various nationalities.100 yrs ago children were of farming stock.In 1913 there were 85 on the roll.Recently we interviewed former pupils.There were memories of:going summer picnics on a hay wagon,singing the National Anthem round the flag on Empire Day,seeing a runaway barrage balloon during World War 2,and the excitement of Musical Festivals in the city.
